trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_SEQ_00<tab>Hihibaru has a suggestion to help you with your investigation.

TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_SEQ_01<tab>In light of your run-in with an Ala Mhigan bandit, Hihibaru recommends that you next take your investigation to Little Ala Mhigo. His daughter, a lass named Hihira, has taken up residence there, and should be able to lend you a hand.
TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_SEQ_02<tab>Hihira has no knowledge of Lahabrea. She recommends you speak with a man named Gundobald, the leader of the refugee settlement.

TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_SEQ_03<tab>As forewarned, you receive a cold welcome from Gundobald. It seems that some effort will be required on your part if the residents of Little Ala Mhigo are to warm to you.
TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Hihira at Little Ala Mhigo.
TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_HIHIBARU_000_000<tab>The Ala Mhigan bandit you had a run-in with is somehow connected to your masked man of mystery.
TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_HIHIBARU_000_001<tab>So, it stands to reason that if you want to pick up the trail again, you should head toward Little Ala Mhigo, over in southern Thanalan.

TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_HIHIBARU_000_002<tab>Just so you know what to expect, the settlement is the favored destination for those refugees who couldn't...well, <var 1A 02 /var>adapt<var 1A 01 /var> to life in Ul'dah.

TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_HIHIBARU_000_003<tab>The hearts of the denizens are said to be as barren as the wasteland they live in. And for all intents and purposes, it's a lawless place. Be prepared for a not-so-warm welcome.

TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_HIHIBARU_000_004<tab>Now, I'm not certain how much a help she will be, but it just so happens I have a daughter who has, er...<var 1A 02 /var>relocated<var 1A 01 /var> to Little Ala Mhigo. Her name is Hihira, and it shouldn't hurt to seek her out first.
TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_HIHIBARU_000_005<tab>And while you have her attention...I'd be obliged if you could send my love. Not a day goes by that I don't think of her.

TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_HIHIBARU_000_006<tab>I suppose this is it, then! I had hoped that you would linger here a while─cull some fiends, spend some coin, what have you─but something tells me you're destined for greater things. Wherever it is you end up, I wish you the best!

TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_HIHIRA_000_010<tab>...Hm? Why, yes, Hihibaru's my father... He said <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var>? <sigh> I wish I could be a better daughter to him. It's just that─ Oh, I'm sorry... I shouldn't bother you with family matters. But I am grateful to you for delivering the message. Now then, what brings you here?

TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_HIHIRA_000_011<tab>A masked man? I'm afraid the description doesn't ring any bells, but one of the others here may have seen something. I would recommend you first speak with Gundobald, the leader of the settlement. I must warn you, though, he isn't exactly...accommodating to outsiders.
TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_GUNDOBALD_000_020<tab>Who are you? State your business, and be quick about it.
TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_GUNDOBALD_000_021<tab>Looking for a masked villain, you say? And why should we help you, pray?
TEXT_GAIUSA505_00757_GUNDOBALD_000_022<tab>We struggle enough without having to answer the whim of every outsider.
